title: Integrating Indigenous Traditional Knowledge with ICT in Mathematics Learning Design

learning_goals: Learners apply foundational math concepts for solving daily life problems with over 80% accuracy via smartphone-based LMS

Learners can explain processes for integrating Indigenous traditional knowledge (e.g., agricultural calculation methods) into modern mathematical problem-solving through collaborative learning activities
